root.name: Letter Zap!
root.description: OverviewLetter Zap! is a puzzle game developed and published by ZAPiT Games for the Game Wave platform.GameplayIn Letter Zap! four players simultaneously have a grid of letters in which the goal is to find as many words as possible. In order to make a word the letters must the touching, and any letter can only be used once in a single word. The game plays almost identically to Boggle.
